name: Bloody Scream
description: This is a single player 2d adventure game about a girl named Reimi trying to escape a gory house of horrors. Along the way she might find out what happened to her missing sister, and find clues to a mysterious character from her past. It is a short escape-themed point-and-click game. The creative process of the game and most of its art and sound resources were created by children in the Miller School of Art video game camp - Summer 2014.
